name: Survive The Horde (Cyberq)
description:
Survive The Horde

Player has to progress by surviving from zombie Attack 

>If player survives then next wave starts in the game

>if player dies then player restarts from wave 1

USP

1) Mix of Arcade and Realistic Shooting Experience 

2)Deadly Zombie Horde

3)Fog of War 

4)Run and gun shooting

Controls 

W,A,S,D movement

Space bar for jumping

Mouse for camera look

Mouse left click to shoot 

Key R is for bullet time
